mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WITHDRAW_TOKEN (USER_INFO_ID, TOKEN_HASH, EXPIRES_AT, STATUS, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT) VALUES (#{userInfoId}, #{tokenHash}, #{expiresAt}, 'PENDING', #{regId}, NOW(), #{regId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE WITHDRAW_TOKEN SET STATUS='INVALID', CHG_ID=#{chgId}, CHG_DT=NOW() WHERE USER_INFO_ID=#{userInfoId} AND STATUS='PENDING'
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_INFO_ID, TOKEN_HASH, EXPIRES_AT, STATUS, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT FROM WITHDRAW_TOKEN WHERE TOKEN_HASH=#{tokenHash} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE WITHDRAW_TOKEN SET STATUS='USED', CHG_ID=#{chgId}, CHG_DT=NOW() WHERE TOKEN_HASH=#{tokenHash} AND STATUS='PENDING'
UPDATE WITHDRAW_TOKEN SET STATUS='EXPIRED', CHG_ID=COALESCE(#{chgId}, 'SYSTEM'), CHG_DT=NOW() WHERE STATUS='PENDING' AND EXPIRES_AT < NOW()
